content: Eh? That's not it! I need you to gather <color=#4cb4b0>five bunches of Three-Leaf Clovers. Just press F when you're near the clover patch</color>. Can you do that?
Such a good-looking person... they'd make an amazing fashion model for me...
Eh?! I'm so sorry, when I see beautiful things, I-I just get completely carried away.
Hm? I haven't seen you around before.
I'm picking out the perfect Three-Leaf Clovers for a wreath, but my legs are getting numb from crouching for so long QAQ... Could you help me out?
I'm Titi, nice to meet you <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>.
